getGoodData.description: testing happy path that a match for 'facebook' will be returned
testing when all required data are upper case then it should return 420
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when the json path is broken and retrieves a json array
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when no keys are provided
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when parameters contain spaces
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when none of the required data are provided
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when 'findMatch' has no data
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when 'findMatch' has spaces
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when the key 'link' is missing
testing to see that error code 420 is returned when the delimiter '>' appears more then once

getBadData.description: testing to see that exception error FileNotFoundException was thrown when the path name is incomplete
testing to see that exception error FileNotFoundException was thrown when calling the wrong file type
testing to see that exception error FileNotFoundException was thrown when the pathname was left out
testing to see that exception error FileNotFoundException was thrown when the file name is left out
testing to see that exception error FileNotFoundException was thrown when 'pathname' has no data
